Ever wished for extra legroom and room to recline? Caribbean Plus now grants your wishes. Learn more: https://t.co/QlFve63I3x 
#iflycaribbean https://t.co/pir9Jn1Z6Q

data.text: @khadine868 Yes, Khadine, seat selection upon Web Check-in is not affected by this new service. However, do note that seats in rows 4 - 10 are reserved for Caribbean Plus customers

@Goffeman Hi Gavin, we're afraid that you may be misquoting our policy just a bit. To clarify, customers have the opportunity to change or cancel their reservation within 24 hours of booking provided that it (the reservation) was made at least 7 days prior to the departure date

@feralvalenz We're sorry for the delay, Fernando. We kindly ask for your patience as our team looks into your claim. We're not able to assist further here as you submitted your baggage claim to the relevant department already. We hope to bring the matter to a close soon
#FunFact Saint Lucia is the world’s only country named after a woman! Ready to explore her beauty? https://t.co/Da6kOqx4sf #stlucia #iflycaribbean https://t.co/LAQGZKPhDh

@TriniLOVE_2018 Hey there, we appreciate your feedback and suggestion. Please share it with our team so that we can work to serve you better. You may submit your feedback here: https://t.co/qrMT7LZhYS
@adacaro Hi there, please ensure that you select the passenger type as "senior" in the  Booking Engine on our website and let us know if that helps.

@tenilleclarke1 Hi Tenille, we're saddened to hear about your experience, but please do note that if you have extra, overweight or oversized bags, then they must be tagged and placed in the baggage hold of the aircraft
@TravelsGringo Hi, we'd like to have our Customer Relations team reach out to you. Could you kindly provide the following via DM?: - Passenger's name, Contact number and Booking Reference Number

@jusokricknu Hi there, if you forgot to use your Miles membership number before flying, you may claim the missing miles once 3 days after your flight has passed by logging into your account here: https://t.co/1fxCH89giC.

Need to find out if your flight is on time? Just check our flight status tool for up-to-date info on your flight from yesterday, today and tomorrow! #flightstatus #iflycaribbean https://t.co/fq9hQpD8L6
@LaJamericaine We appreciate your feedback, Tuere.
@_peptobinchmol We'll always do our best for you. You can count on that!
@LaJamericaine It's a little soon for that, Tuere. Please stay tuned for updates on additional flights or keep checking our Booking Engine for flight availability
